desc: Store for coffee & tea fanatics - Buy freshly roasted & ground Indian Filter Coffee, Creative, Trendy TShirts, Mugs, Hoodies, Mobile cases, Coasters, Pop grips, Posters. Gifting, merchandise and accessories for tea & coffee brewing, storing and enjoying. Free Shipping. 100% Secure Payment.

layout.text:
With Aeka, we are bringing freshly roasted filter coffee to your doorstep.
Tea Lovers - Don't loose heart! Coming soon with some interesting range for you too!
Coffee is all about precision and perfection.. Yes, we all coffee lovers take our coffee seriously, very seriously. Traditional filter coffee enthusiasts know the charm and happiness, the waft of brewing coffee at home brings along. Well, we understand the importance & effort of sourcing your blends and made it simpler than ever by delivering it right at your doorstep. Can't find your favourite blend here? Just drop us a line and we will strive to make it happen for you.
If coffee still means instant coffee for you, it's time to ditch it for the real taste and experience of freshly brewed coffee. For us, coffee is an experience. Aeka brings the new paradigm of coffee with its freshness, perfect roast and simple brewing technique elevating the overall coffee experience for you. We know with so many coffee types out there, it's always confusing. Let us tell you what's special about Aeka - it's not an artisan coffee, not a specialty coffee and definitely not an instant one - It's our very own Indian Filter Coffee.
